courseDetails.title: Sound Sleep Meditation
courseDetails.shortDescription: Improve your sleep, decrease your stress and find focus
targetAudiences: Sound meditation is extremely accessible, as the only requirement is to lay down and listen. With little effort, your mind will put to ease, and you’ll find yourself in a state of deep relaxation and calm in no time.  This sound meditation course can be used anytime you want to relax, but ideally, it should be used whilst falling asleep or when you're preparing for bed.
